LanguageData.Plant_SyrCoffee.label: coffee plant
LanguageData.Plant_SyrCoffee.description: A green, leafy plant yielding coffee beans. These beans can be brewed into a tasty beverage.
LanguageData.SyrCoffee.label: coffee
LanguageData.SyrCoffee.description: A delicious hot cup of coffee. The caffeine in it helps focus when working and allows people to stay up longer, however they need more energy and thus food.
LanguageData.SyrRawCoffee.label: coffee beans
LanguageData.SyrRawCoffee.description: Raw Coffee. Best prepared as a beverage.
